summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning, amending Section 25.2 of and adding new Sections 25.40, 25.41, 25.42, 25.43, 25.44, 25.45 and 25.46 to the Zoning Ordinance (86300) to providing for review of certain rulings and interpretations of the Superintendent of Buildings by the Hearing Examiner.
